title: Navigate forwards to a button in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the button
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button

title: Navigate backwards to a button in reading mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the button
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button

title: Navigate forwards to a button in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the button
instructions: With focus on the 'navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button.

title: Navigate backwards to a button in interaction mode
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link after the button
instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button.

instructions: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Print Page' button.

title: Read information about a button in reading mode
instructions: With the reading cursor on the 'Print Page' button, read information about the button.

title: Read information about a button in interaction mode
instructions: With focus on the 'Print Page' button, read information about the button.
